description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Logan's Treasure is a simple retro arcade platformer.Guide Logan to collect all 40 keys on each levels,and go to exit ro open the treasure chest
